item.title: Cloud Hosting
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Designed secure.
Built for anything.

Forward thinking businesses use our cloud backup service to ensure data reliability and safety. Get started Learn more $39/mo

Shared instance

Affordable, scalable and performant. The perfect solution for small apps.

Start a 30-day trial $49/mo

Shared cluster

A mid-sized solution for businesses undergoing rapid user growth.

Start a 15-day trial $79/mo

Dedicated cluster

A farm of machines entirely dedicated to your company's storage needs.

Sign up now
Complete control

Monitor and analyze usage patterns.

Keep track of what's happening with your data, change permissions, and run reports against your data anywhere in the world.

M+

Active users

Data breaches

%

Global uptime

M+

Terabytes

Seamless integration

Data transfer is just a few clicks.

If we're no longer the right solution for you, we'll allow you to export and take your data at anytime for any reason.

Create your account

Our sign up is dead simple. We only require your basic company information and what type of data storage you want.

Upload your data

We support bulk uploading via SQL, integrations with most data storage products, or you can use our API.

Choose where to transfer

Simply select where you'd like to transfer your data and we'll being the process of migrating it instantly.

* Some integrations require a custom API

All in one solution

A one stop shop for storage.

We are a complete solution for all your storage needs.

Integrations

Basic CRUD API

3rd party snippets

Slack notifications

Zapier hooks

Storage

SQL and SQLite

File system access

Infinite storage

Mongo and NoSQL

Integrations

Basic CRUD API

3rd party snippets

Slack notifications

Zapier hooks

Storage

SQL and SQLite

File system access

Infinite storage

Mongo and NoSQL

Secure your data in minutes.

Prevent security breaches and save money.

Learn more Get started
